definition: classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]

sentences.english: The device used to weave together warp and weft threads is called a loom.
sentences.chinese: 用於編織在一起經紗和緯紗的設備被稱爲一臺織布機。

sentences.english: Keeping the steady warp tension of loom is a key for a loom.
sentences.chinese: 保持織機經紗張力的恆定是織機的一項關鍵技術。

sentences.english: The weaving performance of yarn is generally expressed in terms of warp breakage rate in weaving.
sentences.chinese: 經紗可織性一般用織造時的經紗斷頭率來表示。

sentences.english: The weaving performance of yarn is generally expressed in terms of warp breakage rate in weaving.
sentences.chinese: 經紗可織性一般用織造時的經紗斷頭率來表示。

sentences.english: Single end strength coefficient of variability is the main reason of breakage end.
sentences.chinese: 指出單紗強力不勻是產生經紗斷頭的主要原因。

sentences.english: Warp-tying is another cost factor in the weaving mill.
sentences.chinese: 經紗接頭是織造廠的另一個成本因素。

sentences.english: The shuttle passes over the lowered ends of the shed and under the raised ends.
sentences.chinese: 梭子是從梭口的上下兩層經紗之間穿過。

sentences.english: Because of this, some friction will exist between the shuttle and the warp yarns near the selvages .
sentences.chinese: 因此在布邊附近，梭子和經紗之間會存在摩擦。

sentences.english: In this paper, comparison of sizing technology between two kinds of sizing machines isdealt with by sizing high - count ends.
sentences.chinese: 將細號經紗在兩種漿紗機上進行上漿工藝對比。

sentences.english: In this system, the warp yarns are fed to the loom.
sentences.chinese: 在該系統中，經紗被送入織機。
